words.source: wayyiqtol 3ms Qal from אמר; KJV 'And Pharaoh said', ESV 'Pharaoh said', NASB 'Pharaoh said'
proper noun, subject; all major translations (KJV, ESV, NASB) 'Pharaoh'
imperative ms Qal from עלה; KJV 'Go up', ESV 'Go up', NASB 'Go up'
conjunctive waw + imperative ms Qal from קבר; KJV 'and bury', ESV 'and bury', NASB 'and bury'
et, accusative marker; omitted in English translations (KJV, ESV, NASB)
noun + 2ms suff; KJV 'thy father', ESV 'your father', NASB 'your father'
comparative preposition + relative particle; KJV 'according as', ESV 'as', NASB 'just as'
hiphil perfect 3ms + 2ms suff from שבע; KJV 'he made thee swear', ESV 'he made you swear', NASB 'he made you swear'
